UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: An active domain HF-18 derived from hagfish intestinal peptide effectively inhibited drug-resistant bacteria in vitro/vivo.
Literature.Author: Jiang M, Yang X, Wu H, Huang Y, Dou J, Zhou C, Ma L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml,Mouse splenocytes:42% Killing=200 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:20% Killing=128 µg/ml,Human gastric epithelial cells GES-1:40% Killing=128 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=8µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=8µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 11827(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus sp.(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=8µg/ml),Shigella sp.(MIC=8µg/ml)
